Title: Labyrinth
Writer: Dennis Lee (story), Jim Henson (story), Terry Jones (screenplay)
Actors: David Bowie, Jennifer Connelly, Toby Froud, Shelley Thompson
Plot: A 16-year old girl is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 nominations.
